title: Riot .. What do you mean.
body: I just submitted my support ticket , Gave you my paypal transaction ID's , my credit card info , when I created the account, details FROM 4 YEARS AGO . AND YOU SUBMIT BACK TO ME WITH SORRY THERE ISN'T ENOUGH EVIDENCE TO SUBMIT THIS ACCOUNT AS YOURS?!?!?!?!?! WTF?! ARE YOU DRUNK? I AM TRYING TO KEEP THIS PG BUT ITS REALLY HARD NOT TO

replies.body:
Hey there,

Could you provide me with your ticket number so that I can have this looked into.

I'm a part of the boards volunteer program, [specifically the wrenchmen](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-oce/nE4lj5EB-introducing-the-wrenchmen). We work closely with a few select Rioters.
I'd like some help if you could reply . Sorry i didnt message to an hour late last night
I'm still waiting for more information myself, will let you know when I hear anything.

Hi dude,

I've looked into your tickets and both of your accounts. I can't state here if your account will be getting unlocked but you should be getting another ticket reply soon.
We had to be extra careful on this one because I believe this account (Bard Ross) is also compromised. While waiting for your ticket reply please change your password on this account as well.

I would also ensure your computer is not infected and that you change your password on your email as well, just in case that is how they gained access to your account. Of course, also remember to never share your account password with anyone.

I just changed my passwords for all my accounts . I virus checked my computer :) No malware found so you can unlock now :D I just changed password to my email aswell because you asked. Why couldn't it get unlocked ? what you mean
Your ticket has been replied to.
